review: I wish I would have had this before spending loads of money on cable. I love it, my family loves it.
author: dani

review: Love this!!!! We have 3 in the house now. A must have for Netflix. Watching YouTube on the TV is soooo much nicer than watching on my phone. Have had for a couple months now with no problems so far.
author: Emily Ralston

review: My third chromecast.... Love this product
author: Vamshee

review: I've been using this for a while so I could give a fair review.  I've used Apple, Andriod and windows devices to send control info to this little guy.  It's a neat concept, but falls short for me because I have zero troubleshooting ability.  If it doesn't function properly I have to reboot, that's all I get!  So I end up with loading spinning for long periods and no diagnosis or troubleshooting to work with.  The app is a drag as well.
author: Tesla1893
